segment.source: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Technical Reference (Windows 10)
segment.target: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Technical Reference (Windows 10)

segment.source: The User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 is included with the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) for Windows 10.
segment.target: The User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 is included with the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) for Windows 10.

segment.source: USMT provides a highly customizable user-profile migration experience for IT professionals.
segment.target: USMT provides a highly customizable user-profile migration experience for IT professionals.

segment.source: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Technical Reference
segment.target: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Technical Reference

segment.source: The User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 is included with the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) for Windows 10.
segment.target: The User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 is included with the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) for Windows 10.

segment.source: USMT provides a highly customizable user-profile migration experience for IT professionals.
segment.target: USMT provides a highly customizable user-profile migration experience for IT professionals.

segment.source: Download the Windows ADK from this website.
segment.target: Download the Windows ADK from this website.

segment.source: Note: USMT version 10.1.10586 supports migration of user settings for installations of Microsoft Office 2003, 2007, 2010, and 2013.
segment.target: Note: USMT version 10.1.10586 supports migration of user settings for installations of Microsoft Office 2003, 2007, 2010, and 2013.

segment.source: USMT 10.0 includes three command-line tools:
segment.target: USMT 10.0 includes three command-line tools:

segment.source: ScanState.exe
segment.target: ScanState.exe

segment.source: LoadState.exe
segment.target: LoadState.exe

segment.source: UsmtUtils.exe
segment.target: UsmtUtils.exe

segment.source: USMT 10.0 also includes a set of three modifiable .xml files:
segment.target: USMT 10.0 also includes a set of three modifiable .xml files:

segment.source: MigApp.xml
segment.target: MigApp.xml

segment.source: MigDocs.xml
segment.target: MigDocs.xml

segment.source: MigUser.xml
segment.target: MigUser.xml

segment.source: Additionally, you can create custom .xml files to support your migration needs.
segment.target: Additionally, you can create custom .xml files to support your migration needs.

segment.source: You can also create a Config.xml file to specify files or settings to exclude from the migration.
segment.target: You can also create a Config.xml file to specify files or settings to exclude from the migration.

segment.source: USMT 10.0 tools can be used on several versions of Windows operating systems, for more information, see USMT Requirements.
segment.target: USMT 10.0 tools can be used on several versions of Windows operating systems, for more information, see USMT Requirements.

segment.source: For more information about previous releases of the USMT tools, see User State Migration Tool (USMT) 4.0 User’s Guide.
segment.target: For more information about previous releases of the USMT tools, see User State Migration Tool (USMT) 4.0 User’s Guide.

segment.source: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Overview Topics
segment.target: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Overview Topics

segment.source: Describes what’s new in USMT, how to get started with USMT, and the benefits and limitations of using USMT.
segment.target: Describes what’s new in USMT, how to get started with USMT, and the benefits and limitations of using USMT.

segment.source: User State Migration Tool (USMT) How-to topics
segment.target: User State Migration Tool (USMT) How-to topics

segment.source: Includes step-by-step instructions for using USMT, as well as how-to topics for conducting tasks in USMT.
segment.target: Includes step-by-step instructions for using USMT, as well as how-to topics for conducting tasks in USMT.

segment.source: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Troubleshooting
segment.target: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Troubleshooting

segment.source: Provides answers to frequently asked questions and common issues in USMT, as well as a reference for return codes used in USMT.
segment.target: Provides answers to frequently asked questions and common issues in USMT, as well as a reference for return codes used in USMT.

segment.source: User State Migration Toolkit (USMT) Reference
segment.target: User State Migration Toolkit (USMT) Reference

segment.source: Includes reference information for migration planning, migration best practices, command-line syntax, using XML, and requirements for using USMT.
segment.target: Includes reference information for migration planning, migration best practices, command-line syntax, using XML, and requirements for using USMT.
